Paul Sika bụ onye na-ese foto ejiji na mgbasa ozi, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe, onye amụrụ na 7 Jenụwarị 1985, na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire.
Ọ gụrụ maka injinia ngwanrọ na Mahadum Westminster, United Kingdom n'etiti afọ 2003 na 2007 wee ghọọ onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya na 2008
N'afọ 2009, e nyere ya onyinye Chinua Achebe Center Fellowship
Ọrụ ya nwere echiche dị egwu nke Africa na Technicolor- saturation, ha bụ n'ozuzu ha na-acha uhie uhie
N'ọrụ ya; ọ na-eji ndị na-eme ihe nkiri emepụta gburugburu ebe obibi a haziri nke ọma.
Mgbe ọ chọpụtara onye America na-ese ihe Andy Warhol; ọ kpọrọ onwe ya nwa nwa Warhol
O kwuru ""Mgbe m hụrụ ọrụ LaChapelle, echere m, nke a dị ịtụnanya
Olee otú mmadụ ga-esi nwee echiche dị otú ahụ? Mgbe ị laghachiri n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, Andy Warhol duziri David LaChappelle
Ya mere, ọ bụ ihe na-ese ihe na nna, ọ bụ ya mere m ji kpọọ onwe m nwa nwa Andy Warhol
Dị ka CNN World dere; "Onye na-ese ihe na Ivory Coast bụ Paul Sika abụghị onye na-ese foto nkịtị

"Ihe nkiri otu-frame" ya bụ mgbawa na-adọrọ mmasị nke agba, na-ada n'etiti ihe nkiri na foto.
Mmetụta nke nnukwu ihuenyo ahụ doro anya na foto Sika, nke yiri ihe nkiri sitere na ihe nkiri ultra-stylish, nke dị ntakịrị na Technicolor dị ebube
